summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WhatsApp campaign scheduler improvements including timezone settings, time presets, and sidebar reorganization. Backend API fully functional, frontend loads correctly, authentication system working properly.
passed_tests: Backend health endpoint responds (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with proper branding and content
Login page exists at /login with functional form fields
Authentication system properly redirects unauthorized access
Sidebar code shows 'Buscar Leads' correctly placed in Tools section
Campaign creation dialog implements timezone selection with Brazilian timezones
Time presets implemented (Horário Comercial, Manhã, Tarde, Dia Inteiro)
Visual time window display with graphical representation
Backend API security headers properly configured
